100011 10000 01011 0000000000000100  8E0B0004  -- 0x0
LW $t3 0x0004 $s0

   rt  offset base
00000001001010100110100000100010  012A6822 -- 0x4

SUB $t5 $t1 $t2
    rd  rs  rt
00000001101010111000100000101010  01AB882A -- 0x8
SLT $s1 $t5 $t3
    rd  rs  rt
00010010001000000000000000000011  12200003 -- 0xc
BEQ $s1 $zero 0x0003
    rs  rt    offset
00000001101010110110100000100000  01AB6820 -- 0x10
ADD $t5 $t5 $t3
    rd  rs  rt
00000010001011010110100000100101  022D6825 -- 0x14
OR  $t5 $s1 $t5
    rd  rs  rt
10101110000011010000000000000000  AE0D0000 -- 0x18
SW  $t5 0x0000 $s0
    rt  offset base
10101110000011010000000000000000  AE0D0000 -- 0x1c
SW  $t5 0x0000 $s0
    rt  offset base
